thread.title: Denise
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Denise

author: Denise
title: Denise
text: Where I work they offered this year to send us to have our taxes done for FREE! Imagine that FREE. A lot of my co-worker took advantage of that savings, however, I didn't. R&G Brenner in Bethpage, with Linda Rivera as my representative has been doing my returns for over 15 years. Free or not that is where I went. Thank you Linda, and I will see you next year as well...
